text: Nɨn nɨghnɨzir gavgavir bizir kamɨn itim, a nɨn navimɨn ikɨ. God nɨn nɨghnɨzim gɨfozɨ, nɨ gumazir igharazitamɨn mɨkɨman markɨ. Gumazitam bizitam guizbangɨra, a gɨnɨghnɨzi, bizir kam derazɨ, an navim osemezir puvatɨ, gumazir kam bar akongegham.14:22 Grighɨn akam vezɨn kamɨn deragha bigha mɨkemezir puvatɨ.
